label: Add mech
tooltip: This add a mech to the player's mechbay, or storage. If specified to add to the mechbay it will attempt to add it to the next free bay. If there is none, it will add to storage regardless.

inputs.label: Put into Storage
inputs.tooltip: If true, it will attempt to put the Mech into the player's mechbay. If false, it will put the Mech in storage.

inputs.label: Display Mech Popup
inputs.tooltip: If this is enabled, the 'You have a new Mech' popup appears

inputs.label: Mech Popup Header
inputs.tooltip: Set use of a custom header for the popup
